page.title: 08Carlton Weather Station
page.content: To test the paints the Weathering station has to keep careful checks on all the weather conditions.They have instruments to record the max. and min. air and ground temps.There are rain guages and sunshine recorders and instruments to measure humidity,wind speed and direction.Computers analyse this information and produce charts and graphs for the meteorological Office in London. Data 22-5-85 Air Temp:8.8c Ground Temp:13.7c -------------- ------------------ Max Temp:8.9c Min Temp:7.0c -------------- -------------- Humidity:90.8% --------------- These readings were below normal for this time of the year
